import org.deeplearning4j.datasets.iterator._

import org.deeplearning4j.zoo.model.VGG16

import org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD
import org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext

paragraphs.text:
import org.datavec.image.loader.CifarLoader

val numberOfLabels = CifarLoader.NUM_LABELS
val numberOfSamples = CifarLoader.NUM_TRAIN_IMAGES
val numberOfTestSamples = CifarLoader.NUM_TEST_IMAGES
val batchSizePerWorker = 16

msg.data:
import org.datavec.image.loader.CifarLoader
numberOfLabels: Int = 10
numberOfSamples: Int = 50000
numberOfTestSamples: Int = 10000
batchSizePerWorker: Int = 16

paragraphs.text:
import org.datavec.image.loader.BaseImageLoader
import collection.JavaConverters._
import java.io.File

val states = Map("filesFilename" -> "cifar-10-binary.tar.gz", "filesURL" -> "https://storage.googleapis.com/ufrgsneuwald/~kriz/cifar-10-binary.tar.gz", "filesFilenameUnzipped" -> "cifar-10-batches-bin")

BaseImageLoader.downloadAndUntar(states, new File(new File(System.getProperty("user.home")), "cifar"))

msg.data:
import org.datavec.image.loader.BaseImageLoader
import collection.JavaConverters._
import java.io.File
states: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(filesFilename -> cifar-10-binary.tar.gz, filesURL -> https://storage.googleapis.com/ufrgsneuwald/~kriz/cifar-10-binary.tar.gz, filesFilenameUnzipped -> cifar-10-batches-bin)

paragraphs.text:
val testDataSet = new CifarDataSetIterator(batchSizePerWorker, numberOfTestSamples, false)
import scala.collection.mutable.ListBuffer

val testDataList = new ListBuffer[DataSet]()
while (testDataSet.hasNext()) {
  testDataList += testDataSet.next()
}

val testData = sc.parallelize(testDataList)

paragraphs.text:
val seed = 123456 // integer for reproducability of a random number generator
val zooModel2 = new VGG16(numberOfLabels, seed, 3)
import org.deeplearning4j.zoo.PretrainedType
val m = zooModel2.initPretrained(PretrainedType.CIFAR10).asInstanceOf[ComputationGraph]

paragraphs.text:
import org.deeplearning4j.spark.impl.graph.SparkComputationGraph
val sparkNetCG = new SparkComputationGraph(sc, m, null)
val resultado = sparkNetCG.doEvaluation(testData, 64, new Evaluation(10))
